name: BromicSmart-Heat
0:
”Alexa, Turn on Heater 1”
”Alexa, Turn on Heater 1 Light”
”Alexa, Set Heater 1 Power to fifty percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With this skill you can control your Bromic Smart-Heat devices. You can turn them on or off and set their power simply by using your voice. If they're equipped with a light, you can control that as well.
To configure this skill you need to have installed the Bromic Smart-Heat app for Android or iOS, have created an account and set up your heaters. Use that account to log in to this skill and enjoy the ease of controlling your heaters through Alexa.
